commit 0194e342500624c77ca27d20075c388541284242
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-03-03 12:36:36 +0100

    Allow cells to have multiple renderers
    
    Each cell can define prefixes and suffixes renderer which will be added to the
    column using their expand property.
    We use this new feature to replace the CellRendererBinary by
    CellRendererClickablePixbuf's for each buttons.
    We implement also an editable cell for Reference fields by using a Selection
    and a Many2One cell.
    In order to be able to navigate between cells of the same column, we do not
    validate anymore the field when the cell is left for another of the same
    record (this is a similar behavior to the form). Also the next and previous
    columns are checked if they are editable if start_editing is set to ensure to
    stay in edition mode during the all navigation.
    
    issue8112
    issue6918
    review46761002

3	0	CHANGELOG

commit 6e3a7bbf3acf7fe9049278798937045a2203e97d
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-02-26 15:41:03 +0100

    Do not use set_text of Many2One and Reference when setting only string
    
    changeset 13d81b52b4c4 replaced some direct call to wid_text.set_text by the
    set_text but it set_text on Reference expect to receive a tuple (from
    get_client). So when set_text is called just to clear or update the wid_text
    it loose the selection of Reference.
    Indeed as most of the time, it is called with an empty string, there is no
    need to set the position of the entry.
    
    issue8114
    review54541002

5	5	tryton/gui/window/view_form/view/form_gtk/many2one.py
1	1	tryton/gui/window/view_form/view/form_gtk/reference.py

6	0	tryton/action/main.py

commit 0a5b52fff597483481c20011861452a11b233504
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-02-20 12:14:12 +0100

    Migrate cellrenderer to introspection and store editable
    
    In order to limit issue with vfunc, it is better to follow the best practice
    by using introspection without pygtkcompat.
    Also vfunc may have issue with object created by it and returned, so it is
    safer to keep a Python reference to on the Python class.
    
    issue8110
    review47811002

commit fa768bffd31b7747246e446201a29626632bc36f
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-02-20 12:04:00 +0100

    Delay execution of CellRendererBinary callbacks
    
    If those callbacks open a popups, GTK shows some warning and eventually it
    leads to a segmentation fault. So we delay them using by executing them when
    the loop is idle.
    
    issue8111
    review48731002

commit 6d944c065303e92fb4928aa58617c4a384edf5cb
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-02-03 20:29:09 +0100

    Ensure sort key always return an integer
    
    When sorting tree model, it is possible that some ids are not in the ordered
    list (because they do not fit anymore in the domain). So we return the number
    of records so they are moved at the end of the list.
    
    issue8042
    review53531002

2	1	tryton/gui/window/view_form/view/list.py

commit 7cc972c63b9c5c80a5e29cbd7b6713c6b1303353
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-02-03 20:25:03 +0100

    Remove call to window_list_toplevels when destroying NoModal
    
    The test was added by changeset 5b5d0c1660e9 to prevent case when the parent
    was destoyed before the NoModal. This happened when creating a record from the
    search window. But this is no more the case with changeset b87844203f77 as the
    search window is destroyed before the creation of the form window.
    As the window_list_toplevels has shown multiple times to generate segmentation
    fault, it is safer to stop calling it and remove the test which is normally no
    more needed.
    
    issue8049
    review52621002

0	5	tryton/gui/window/nomodal.py

commit 133afc9c28aad7a9f49c101b186a1bec832f97b8
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-01-30 10:11:33 +0100

    Always display tree views to keep model up to date
    
    Any tree view may be used even if it is not shown e.g. to save tree state. So
    the model of TreeView which keeps a reference to the group must be updated if
    the group has changed.
    
    issue7885
    review60491002

4	0	tryton/gui/window/view_form/screen/screen.py

commit ea591cbb4c190c4c437f67062d9cf0766a35f254
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-01-30 10:10:00 +0100

    Rely on editing property of renderer to set value
    
    In Python3, the 'remove-widget' is not trigger when the selected row is
    changed. This makes the attribute editabletree_entry not reliable. Instead we
    should use the editing property of the renderer and manage the editable
    reference on the widget (which is a cleaner separation concept). This allows
    also to remove duplicate code in set_value by calling on_editing_done.
    
    issue7936
    review46711002

commit 8a4adbccc3ef7bd2db24227d5145ba51ed370a21
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-01-02 18:56:34 +0100

    Keep column arrow up to date
    
    When an order is set on a One2Many widget and the user reload the form, the
    selected order is lost and so the client should no more display those arrow.
    For that we update the arrows on each display using the screen order. And we
    unset the screen order when the group change as we do not know the order of
    this group.
    
    issue7817
    review70481002

commit 3a97da563307a04adba5c0189f99f57cf873e785
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-01-02 18:53:18 +0100

    Do not recycle first record as product result
    
    The value of the field of the first record, which is edited in the list, will
    be lost. Because the editable widget is started before the search pop-up and
    it override the new default value with its content when the pop-up is closed.
    So we can not reuse record create before the pop-up.
    
    issue7941
    review49681002

commit c262a535d481dbc71fe84f5d00709e44474c26e8
Author: Nicolas Évrard <nicoe@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-12-20 18:44:31 +0100

    Fix domain inversion of child_of mixing M2O and Reference fields
    
    Domain inversion on Reference field does not work when using the dotted
    notation with a M2O field using child_of or parent_of.
    
    To solve this we correctly compute the localization of child_of leaves when
    using the dotted notation (which renders the inverse_leaf function useless).
    But we must also ensure that the selection used by reference fields restrict
    the choice to the right models.
    
    issue7869
    review60441002

commit 9cfbb3c6a2335f20e2126864b0bccdcd963d5a00
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-05-23 23:27:55 +0200

    Use sig_save to get message info when triggering an action
    
    Instead of always calling save_current on the screen, it is better to call
    sig_save when the record has been modified. This allows to get message
    information about failure or success but only if the record needed to be
    saved.
    
    issue7430
    review45101002

commit 951fdb30bb768b3643dde372094316f24a1f0598
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-05-10 20:13:24 +0200

    Correctly evaluate domain with reference field and list/tuple values
    
    The python formatting of multiple values must be a tuple because a list is
    used as a single argument.
    If both sides are mixed tuple and list types, they must be compared using the
    same type.
    
    issue7418
    review48321002

    which means being attached to a widget.

commit 334cea35ca3df47b96544f9387c884483771d606
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-04-22 00:24:54 +0200

    Do not fail on timezone operation before epoch on Windows
    
    dateutil fails to use tzlocal on Windows for datetime before epoch.
    So we just skip the timezone conversion which result in using UTC.
    
    issue4582
    review36231003

commit 92825ede656d5f77705193c77b012204d7edc130
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-04-13 18:44:52 +0200

    Remove decoration on NoModal and resize/center when shown
    
    Since changeset 4655eba14d71, the size of the dialog is the same as the parent
    but if the OS put decoration on the dialog, it position overflow the parent
    which may hide the bottom where the button are.
    The choice is to ensure request no decoration and to ensure that the size and
    position are reset when the NoModal is shown.
    
    issue7300
    review47261002

commit 4fbcbdc9e9c02194c2789ef02bbcccb8d6a7b0b4
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-03-19 15:58:02 +0100

    Raise exception when the Lock for Login could not be acquired
    
    The case when RPCExecute returns None is always forgotten. This shows that it
    is the wrong design. Instead catching RPCException is always managed.
    So it is better to raise an exception instead of returning None when the lock
    for Login can not be acquired.
    
    issue7211
    review43231002

commit 44a8b18335454b0ac8eb5ad1c8ab5c89d7fd2e36
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-02-19 19:06:45 +0100

    Ensure right exceptions are raised by RPCExecute callback
    
    - The callback must raise the exception
    - If the exception is processed, the remaining exception should be an
      RPCException
    - process_exception must not call itself because the rpc_execute already
      manage the exception
    - The creation of the warning record should not use rpc_execute to not trigger
      the callback of the second call
    
    issue7094
    review44621002

commit 2291b1148838c08f1f2ab37fac2f77488a2a1365
Author: Adrien <adrien.benduc@coopengo.com>
Date:   2017-10-29 00:46:11 +0200

    Use group-changed to update wizard buttons states
    
    record-modified is often call earlier because the listener is not supposed to
    use the values. But group-changed is triggered by record-changed which is
    called when all the fields are really changed included from on_change calls.

commit 41bb703eb9994868f2d6a3dcddee19c59a37e573
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-07-12 20:00:59 +0200

    Do not store host/port split
    
    There is a mismatch between how the profiles are stored. Sometimes the host
    contains the port and sometimes not. So we rationalize this by removing the
    storage of the port and always store the full host as the user type it.
    
    issue6595
    review36421002

commit faf7fa107d9d472328c1c590ab81f3e63361e4bb
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-04-26 19:36:21 +0200

    Skip validate only on constant readonly fields
    
    A field can be readonly by the domain inversion in the validate method. So it
    should be validated again in case its domain inversion change and reset it a
    non-readonly.
    So only field that are always readonly can be skipped for the validation.
    
    issue6448
    review37351002

    The parent test is redundant with the force_remove flag. So be removing this
    test, we activate the remove/unremove feature on WinForm without parent.

    removing all the rows.

commit fcaca13efb4fbe05b87c230e0cfcb0a91f55f2b6
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-01-13 20:04:01 +0100

    Load autocomplete only on display of Char widget
    
    Keeping the autocomplete always up to date is very expensive especially for
    large list because the method is called once per field for each record.
    Indeed autocomplete is only needed when the Char widget is displayed. So we
    could just load it at display and keep it up to date when fields are changed.
    
    issue6167
    review34611002

    url), it is better to store the default value on the Screen. Also it should be
    stored privately on the Screen to avoid modification which could result into an
    inconsistency on the display.

    Set parent on RPCProgress only for asynchronous call

    loop will not have a chance to update the cursor.
    
    issue5845

8	5	tryton/common/common.py

commit 7ddcd616e18648f9e83f6ee41c08090c652f665d
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-09-06 09:07:08 +0200

    Do not popup error message in favorit_set
    
    The method is triggered by the menu select event which will trigger a
    segmentation fault in GTK if a popup (error message or login) is displayed
    during the callback.
    So we just ignore the error and let the callback triggered a next time.
    
    issue5843
    review32561002

4	3	tryton/gui/main.py

commit 999824d30d687fd7576efa056385c68d61e16185
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-08-31 23:00:05 +0200

    Do not store in calendar invalid event
    
    The user could create an event with an end date before the start date during
    edition. So event must not be added to the store of GooCalendar because it does
    not support such inconsistency.
    
    issue5723
    review33291002

commit d3c99486253228bfa8454a6261b1ffa450dabab7
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-08-31 22:55:03 +0200

    Convert file names from gtk.FileChooserDialog
    
    On POSIX, it is encoded using the file system encoding.
    On Windows, it is always UTF-8.
    See http://www.pygtk.org/pygtk2reference/class-gtkfilechooser.html#FileNamesAndEncodings
    
    issue5671
    review21231002

commit 32c92fa28597a05d34457f145752b04e9377106f
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-08-01 21:03:36 +0200

    Trigger editing-done on ComboBox changed only if a row is selected
    
    The CellRendererTime uses also a ComboBoxEntry for editing but parsing it on
    every change does not work because the parsing will expect a valid time format
    otherwise the current text will be erased.
    So to keep the original goal of changeset 3591350f0018 which is to trigger
    "editing-done" when an option from the drop-down menu is selected, the callback
    on "changed" must ensure there is an active row selected.
    
    issue5746
    review28601002

commit 209d874cbdacc5178f0090e8d9abfa19cec048ef
Author: Karla Stenger <karla.stenger@gmail.com>
Date:   2016-04-09 00:31:07 -0300

    Strip spaces from hostname
    
    Some systems allow connecting to a hostname contaning trailing spaces,
    but saving this value to the known_hosts causes corruption and
    subsequent segfault.
    So this patch sanitizes the hostname before connect.
    
    issue5290
    review24131002

commit c5653a3840fdb7c8dbb350d438b967bde2b8873a
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-03-21 23:49:11 +0100

    Improve speed of setting default value on One2Many
    
    When the default value of One2Many is a list of values, a lot of signals are
    triggered for each record, this can be avoided like in changeset f09978373d97.
    Also adding fields could always set_default to new record without signal and
    just trigger the signal for the last record.
    Finally, the validation in set_default is useless when performed from a
    One2Many because the parent record will validate it anyway.
    
    issue5161
    review16131003

commit 077bb694a041b992f41adf383ac072399f5c5b51
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-03-05 17:33:18 +0100

    Stop delete-event for non-deletable windows
    
    Window.set_deletable doesn't always prevent some window manager to show the
    close button and more over it doesn't prevent to close the window via other
    means like keyboard shortcuts.
    To ensure those windows will not be deleted, we must prevent the delete-event
    to propagate.
    
    issue4505
    review16021002

1	0	tryton/gui/window/view_form/view/screen_container.py

commit 00470867f7a5e2d6155249158fd50da2b4569054
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-03-05 17:24:12 +0100

    Use a list to store feed data in JSONUnmarshaller
    
    Creating a new string could be very expensive for large amount of data,
    especially because xmlrpclib read response and feed the parser with chunk of
    1024. So it is better to store the feed data in a list and create the string
    only once when closing the parser.
    
    issue5237
    review19951003

commit 6533d7e3ab5a10d529bdc0cfb74e5e859ff6028f

Date:   2016-01-13 21:12:12 +0100

    Detect time-changed on Time widget in Form
    
    The Time widget must connect to time-changed like the other comboboxes (Char,
    Selection) to call focus_out when it changes.

commit a60f7ed50952d0d31ea276fa707b14dfb4cbc595
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2015-10-18 16:49:29 +0200

    Let GenericText instantiate renderer for Selection
    
    The GenericText connect the renderer to the send_keys callback which manage the
    keypress event for editable tree. It will be lost if the Selection widget
    override the renderer. GenericText was designed to allow to pass the renderer
    class to instantiate so Selection widget should use this method.
    
    issue5044
    review15741002

commit 597080b2a0a0bc8d878d2c349f16f0ee5400b423
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2015-08-10 11:07:08 +0200

    Fix TypeError during min/max computation in Graph
    
    If the field is a datetime, a date or a timedelta but the value if None, it
    could be compared to an existing instance and so raise a TypeError.
    So the min/max value must be set with a correct value and TypeError must be
    catched if the record value is None.
    
    issue4888
    review16501002

commit 301867e1339ddcc96ed14667938ddaf2d01b5408
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2015-03-22 03:22:11 +0100

    Fix display inactive selection
    
    get_inactive_selection just return the text but doesn't fill the popdown with
    the inactive selection. So the popdown must be re-filled with the selection and
    the inactive selection, the inactive selection will be removed on the next
    display with an other value.

commit e62c79486a3d7a9d13b2968f73ff7e71519ab694
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2015-03-18 11:13:29 +0100

    Clear record timestamp after save
    
    Since changeset 28a09c279d67, the timestamp is sent also on button calls but if
    the record is saved just before this generate an concurrency exception. Indeed
    the _timestamp must be cleared just after the save (because the record is not
    reloaded before the button call).
    
    issue4644
    review8021002

    to find columns that has always the same value.

commit 682b9a37232fcc1ce42e8307e109ea4034202ed4
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2015-02-28 11:25:46 +0100

    Format exception using format_exception
    
    format_tb doesn't return the exception but only the traceback so it is harder
    to copy paste the all exception like for a server error. As it calls directly
    the error dialog, there is no more need for the tb kwargs in process_exception.
    
    issue4576
    review11941002

commit 1fe750ec473d9a68aefa61a5af181b857995403d
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-06-28 14:51:36 +0200

    Don't use super to get the parent do_* methods of gtk widget
    
    With some version of GTK, using super call to get the do_* function doesn't
    work.  It seems it returns a meta function that will call back the do_* of the
    instance. So this leads to an infinite loop.

commit 49b3fc26efec3fb37e8144af174f6f17e55edde3
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-03-21 12:20:05 +0100

    Don't set cursor when displaying widget and correctly manage selection in list view
    
    When clicking on new, a new record instance is set as current_record and display
    is called. But as the changeset ff6dc4d5bff6 adds a call to display with
    set_cursor, it triggers the focus out of the widget having the cursor which
    could set the value of the previous record to the new record if the widget was
    not yet displayed.
    So display on widget should never set the cursor but indeed it is the display of
    the list view that must set the correct selection when the store is changed.
    
    issue3757
    review4481002

1	3	tryton/gui/window/view_form/view/form_gtk/one2many.py
6	4	tryton/gui/window/view_form/view/list.py

commit c3d35c7aa057257fa0924c20c5044433f3404e34
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-03-04 11:44:06 +0100

    Use explicit callback instead of implicit gtk main iteration in rpc calls
    
    The implicit gtk main iteration leads to bad ordered processing of events. So as
    explicit is better than implicit, rpc calls that don't need to block until the
    result use a callback.
    
    review3461002

commit efac3f60360852865859ed57dfad24c1a3e1910a
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-02-10 22:23:04 +0100

    Remove early attribute clearing in destroy
    
    Removing those attributes could lead to errors where in the code we expect to
    have those attributes.
    It is better to leave them and let the garbage collector detect them.
    
    review3251002

    column in the view.

commit 09ceaba41b7014f054d41b950ac18c14ecf3a2f7
Author: Nicolas Évrard <nicoe@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-01-26 18:03:00 +0100

    reset tree_states_done when setting a screen group
    
    The O2M screen's tree_states_done property is filled with the view id, this
    property is used to know when the state must be set or not. This has the effect
    of not restoring the state of O2M widget when switching from a record to
    another. This change fixes this behavior.
    
    issue3609
    review2791003

    Fix reload of screen at the end of wizard
    
    A wizard could be launch by a button defined on a children record. In this case,
    the ids to reload is not the ids from the wizard as they are from the children
    model but just the current record.

commit 0f27586b516c14f307b250d9543b9b023a358e0a
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2013-09-28 14:57:53 +0200

    Block button handler instead of deactivate button
    
    By deactivating the button, the button lost the focus which makes NoModal
    selects the wrong sensitive widget and thus the wizard behaves like if it was
    launched from the menu instead of from a tab.
    
    issue3353
    review1083003
    (transplanted from 0d135623d016ce2d8185fcb5790eb22d9d8de254)

2	2	tryton/gui/window/view_form/view/form.py

Date:   2013-09-04 10:41:21 +0200

    Don't use field digits to format float/Decimal in domain_parser
    
    The conversion of a domain into string should keep the same significant digit,
    which means to not use the field digits definition but significant digit of the
    value.

    Revert the changeset 47524e77438b
    Using focus out event is wrong because it hides the window when opening an
    other dialog box from the search box (like the date picker).

    toplevel windows.

commit f39ecd0cef9155bd480555d61fab400c0c3b23f7

commit 937915e9f8b33d7990bb77299319d8ff1fbda2a0
Author: Ralf Peschke <rpeschke@peschke-it.de>
Date:   2013-03-29 08:28:27 +0100

    Prevent o2m-records to be deleted on client-side
    
    When I delete some records of an one2many-field in an on-change-Event, the
    deleted records are sent to the client and the client hides them in the list.
    Pressing the save button the record loads again including the deleted o2m-records.
    
    The reason is the force_remove-flag. This will delete the record on the
    client-side and therefore this change will not be reflected on the server side.
    
    issue3091
    review744002
    (transplanted from e40190b28b312f3dd63bceb167698a885826ea0e)

1	1	tryton/gui/window/view_form/model/field.py

Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2012-09-27 23:14:23 +0200

    Allow to paste in editable list view
    
    Paste is allowed only on editable list.
    The paste starts at the cell selected or the first one if None.
    The paste stops on a field if it can not set the value or if the resulted value
    is different.
    The paste set the focus on the last record modified and save each record one by
    one.
    
    review530002

commit 17a82d0a5f23817e46defd4a88cbfb3165b0a4f3
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2012-08-16 14:57:00 +0200

    Don't use Screen.save_current in button_clicked
    
    Screen.save_current force the reload of the record before the call to the
    Button RPC. So this could generate a race condition between the button call and
    the reload of the record.
    
    issue2739
    review460001
    (transplanted from dade8f50910b320f00618418a409f22f169b147a)

7	5	tryton/gui/window/view_form/view/form.py

5	0	tryton/jsonrpc.py

commit 5f3fd4d64ff6a7478929bad04e61f09aeb0a2456
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2012-08-11 12:17:18 +0200

    Fix gtk.Button state corruption
    
    By default gtk.Button grab the focus on button-press, this can potentially
    trigger a RPC request from by example a Many2One filled with search text. If
    the request takes too much time, RPCProgress starts to process events and this
    put the button in a corrupted state (it is displayed as pressed when mouse if
    over).
    To avoid, we set the value of the view when mouse move over a button or outside
    the form.
    
    review447001

Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2012-05-19 15:37:35 +0200

    Use one record pool per group
    
    Having a global pool has some side effect between tabs.
    So it is better to get read optimization only inside one tab by using a pool on
    the main group.

    review370002

commit 898d017b1e6fdce77b233bdd283c1b7b27e6fd6b
Author: Phillip Heller <pheller@me.com>
Date:   2011-11-23 20:42:04 -0500

    Fix recognition of Mac OS X based systems
    
    Previously, Mac OS X was recognized during py2app invocation, as well as runtime
    by comparison of os.name with 'macos'.  The value of os.name reports as 'posix'
    under more recent version of Python built on Mac OS X.  Now, the recognition is
    instead done by comparing sys.platform with 'darwin'.
    
    issue2258
    review171004
    (transplanted from d2d9d6ec6da433a5d7df4b07e089f21536b9e4fb)

2	4	setup.py
1	2	tryton/common/common.py
1	2	tryton/config.py
2	3	tryton/gui/main.py
2	5	tryton/gui/window/view_form/view/list.py
2	2	tryton/translate.py

commit 557b19dd3f1f54d7094a3567b24e934a0c0f6c18
Author: Phillip Heller <pheller@me.com>
Date:   2011-11-22 13:15:45 -0500

    Fix discovery of gdk-pixbuf-loaders
    
    gdk-pixbuf-loaders location has changed with recent builds of gtk, which breaks
    the build of binary client distributions.  This changeset discovers their
    proper location by parsing output of gdk-pixbuf-query-loaders.
    
    issue1976
    review176001
    (transplanted from 01783c935c47d0d718f1b33e8706f05541ab4fa5)

12	6	setup.py

commit 344d4342e6b5d237eeb42e59c16c2277f509bbbb
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2011-01-30 22:58:44 +0100

    Add communication between boards
    
    The communication (refresh) is simply activated by using "_active_%s" in the
    domain of the act_window (where %s is the id of the other act_window).  When
    the selection of one board is changed, every other board domain are evaluated
    and if they change the corresponding board is reloaded.

    Rewrite the dbcreate from glade to pygtk with additional functions.
    - Better tooltips for all widgets
    - While input validation for databasename
    - Restrict databasenames according to he following rules:
      - Allowed characters are alpha-nummeric [A-Za-z0-9] and underscore (_)

      - Length of databasename less equal 63 characters

    - Create button appears only if all required entrys compleated
    - Introduce another error message for AccessDenied:
      tryton server password is wrong!
    - All entryboxes listen to signal ctrl-u by  clear the actual entrybox
    - Message "Can't connect to database" is appened in the same box where the
      connection is shown. No additional popup. (Needs fitting in the regex in
      common.py. See next commit.)
    - Renaming the variables to more meaningful names.
    - All buttons get icons.
